list.title: doesStackIncludeCard
list.description: Determine if the stack contains the card.

list.title: doesStackIncludeOddCard
list.description: Check if stack contains odd-value card.

list.title: getCardPosition
list.description: Get the position (index) of the card in the given stack.

list.title: getFirstEvenCardPosition
list.description: Determine the position of the first card that is even.

list.title: getFirstOddCard
list.description: Get the first odd card from the stack.

list.title: isEachCardEven
list.description: Determine if each card is even.
